name: Ballet of Pain (Alexis Clay) (Alexis Clay)
description:
Rain hell in this bullet shoot-em-up!

Controls:
Press K to kill self in case the game soft-locked
Rotate mouse around player - reload
R - Restart game
W/A/S/D or arrows - move
left mouse button - shoot 1 bullet
right mouse button - shoot 10 bullets

Scores available on Newgrounds.com:
https://www.newgrounds.com/portal/view/850002#

This game was inspired by Enter The Square. Please check it out: https://qwerty.itch.io/enter-the-square

Ballet of Pain uses attribution licensed sound effects from Freesound.org, Sonniss.com, & Bfxr. As well as licensed music from The Phase.
